text:
yuilop is hiring! Our mission is to make communication free&easy, for everybody, to everybody, to any phone, anywhere in the world. We're looking for Android, Nokia, Java, erlang and SIP/VOIP hackers, plus DBAs and many other positions. More info here:

http://yuilop.com/intl/jobs/

Feel free to drop me a mail, adam (at) yuilop dotcom
